subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Coaches and Managers
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Alain Vigneault could become the third coach since the N.H.L. expanded in 1967 to lead a team to the finals in each of his first two seasons.
snippet: Alain Vigneault could become the third coach since the N.H.L. expanded in 1967 to lead a team to the finals in each of his first two seasons.
